reviewText: I just purchased this video and it's one of the very best werewolf movies ever made with big, larger than life werewolf action scenes. Watch the werewolf go on a big-time vicious rampage, attack numerous groups of people and especially watch the werewolf as it gets pitted inside a dungeon go fang to fang, claw to claw with a bengal tiger. This is definitely a must-see movie for all werewolf lovers. I suggest that more copies of this movie be made so that way other people may see this awesome masterpiece for themselves.
